QuestData.Title: Cubic Currents
QuestData.Description: To determine this cube's purpose, we need to power it up. Hmm, I have an idea...$b$bThe Nightborne covet a substance you are no doubt familiar with called ancient mana. Should be just the thing for a relic this old. Gather a sufficient quantity and we'll attempt to get it working.$b$bBe careful in Suramar! It would be a shame if this curious cube were lost and became a memory once more.
